tasks.label: preRun openOCD
tasks.command: clear & C:/Espressif/tools/openocd-esp32/v0.12.0-esp32-20250707/openocd-esp32/bin/openocd.exe -d${config:idf.openOcdDebugLevel} -f interface/ftdi/esp_ftdi.cfg -c "adapter speed 14000" -f target/esp32.cfg -c init -c "reset halt" -c "esp32.cpu0 configure -rtos FreeRTOS"  -c "esp32.cpu1 configure -rtos FreeRTOS" -c "set ESP_RTOS none"  & exit

background.beginsPattern: Listening on port 3333 for gdb connections
